docs.text: Welcome to Pokemon Mystery Dungeon What is it about: This project was created on a whim. A development project to create the orginal Pokemon Mystery Dungeon my Gamefreak and teh Pokemon Company. How to get started If you are a user with above average terminal and Git bash knowlege, on the setup page a GitHub repository is availiable for you to browse. Users new to GitHub: At the bottom of the page press next and continue through with the tutorial.

docs.title: Users new to GitHub:

docs.text: How to play: To begin the game double click the main.exe file in the \Final Distrubution folder. If you are confused with this step, go back in the documentation to the setup tab. The Controls: ← - Left Arrow key - Use to choose menu items and move character. ↑ - Up Arrow Key - Use to choose menu items and move character. → - Right Arrow Key - Use to choose menu items and move character. ↓ - Down Arrow Key - Use to choose menu items and move character. Space bar - Basic attack, hold down. return/ enter - Use to copnfirm selection in menus.

docs.text: Pokemon Mystery Dungeon Docx Setup: To start using the beta game version, you will need to have the compiled binary availiable at: [https://github.com/MegaPanchamZ/PKMD-Recreation-For-SDD] For easy use, clone then repository or download it as a zip. If you have a FinalDistrubution.zip file, use an unzipping tool like 7z or winRar etc. to unzip the folder. If you already have the Final Distrubution folder skip to the bottom of the page. If you are able to use Git Bash terminal: Cloning Repo Cloning a repository to GitHub Desktop Further reading This procedure assumes you have already created a repository on GitHub , or have an existing repository owned by someone else you'd like getyour hands on. On GitHub, navigate to the main page of the repository. Note: If the repository is empty, you can manually copy the repository page's URL from your browser and skip to step four. Under the repository name, click Clone or download . To clone the repository using HTTPS, under "Clone with HTTPS", click . To clone the repository using an SSH key, including a certificate issued by your organization's SSH certificate authority, click Use SSH , then click . Open Git Bash. Change the current working directory to the location where you want the cloned directory to be made. Type git clone , and then paste the URL you copied in Step 2. shell $ git clone https://github.com/A-USERNAME/A-REPOSITORY Press Enter . Your local clone will be created. ```shell $ git clone https://github.com/YOUR-USERNAME/YOUR-REPOSITORY Cloning into Spoon-Knife ... remote: Counting objects: 10, done. remote: Compressing objects: 100% (8/8), done. remove: Total 10 (delta 1), reused 10 (delta 1) Unpacking objects: 100% (10/10), done. ``` Cloning a repository to GitHub Desktop On GitHub, navigate to the main page of the repository. Under your repository name, click to clone your repository in Desktop. Follow the prompts in GitHub Desktop to complete the clone. For more information, see " Cloning a repository from GitHub to GitHub Desktop ." When you have the repository: All that is left to do is navigate to the \Final Distrubution folder and then double click the main.exe file.
docs.title: Setup
